name: Sneak
description:
You have the power to Infiltrate. As the defense, after you lose an encounter that results in losing one of your home colonies, you may use this power to immediately place your ships from the losing encounter on any one planet in the offense's home system instead of sending them to the warp.
You do not lose this power because of having too few home colonies.
lore: The Sneaks are masters of disguise and stealth. In fact, there are many conflicting opinions about what the aliens actually look like, where they live, and what sort of technology they have at their disposal. This suits the Sneaks fine, as they are quick to take advantage of the confusion and insinuate themselves into other aliens' societies.

wild.description: As the defense, after losing an encounter, you may look at your opponent's hand before or after any compensation is collected. Take one of those cards and add it to your hand.

super_flare.description: When using your power, you may establish two colonies in the offense's home system as long as you have enough ships to create two colonies. Afterwards, give this flare to any player.
